message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,800,000. I'm confident this is a fair starting point for our discussion.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay $1,400,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective on the value, but I'm looking for a price closer to $1,650,000. This reflects the significant value this product holds.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,550,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise.
